20110110190010.000|20110110190010.000|CC1|ARIZONA.

20110110190017.000|20110110190019.000|CC1|ON FEDERAL CHARGES OF TRYING TO 
20110110190019.000|20110110190022.000|CC1|ASSASSINATE GABRIELLE GIFFORDS. 
20110110190022.000|20110110190024.000|CC1|HE'S ACCUSED OF KILLING SIX     
20110110190024.000|20110110190027.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND INJURING 12 HOURS.   
20110110190027.000|20110110190028.000|CC1|THE PIMA SHRVE SAYS THE SUSPECT 
20110110190028.000|20110110190030.000|CC1|IS NOT COOPERATING.

20110110190037.000|20110110190039.000|CC1|MOVING HER FINGERS.

20110110190451.000|20110110190455.000|CC1|HOURS AFTER THE INTERVIEW,

20110110190742.000|20110110190744.000|CC1|HAS A LOT OF FAILURES IN HIS    
20110110190744.000|20110110190745.000|CC1|BACKGROUND.

20110110190747.000|20110110190749.000|CC1|HE FAILED TO GET IN THE         
20110110190749.000|20110110190751.000|CC1|MILITARY.
